2 = (1.0) x 2^1
[0][10000000][00000000000000000000000]

30 = (1.111) x 2^4
[0][10000011][11100000000000000000000]

31 = (1.1111) x 2^4
[0][10000011][11110000000000000000000]

32 = (1.0) x 2^5
[0][10000100][00000000000000000000000]

33 = (1.00001) x 2^5
[0][10000100][00001000000000000000000]

23/4 = (1.0111) x 2^2
[0][10000001][01110000000000000000000]

(23/4) x 2^100	= (1.0111) x 2^102
[0][11100101][01110000000000000000000]

(23/4) x 2^-100	= (1.0111) x 2^-98
[0][00011101][01110000000000000000000]

(23/4) x 2^-135	= (1.0111) x 2^-133 = (0.00000010111) x 2^-126
[0][00000000][00000010111000000000000]

1/5 = (1.100110011001100110011) x 2^-3
[0][01111100][10011001100110011001100]

1024/5 = (1.100110011001100110011) x 2^7
[0][10000110][10011001100110011001100]

(1/10) x 2^-140	= (1.100110011001100110011) x 2^-144
                = (0.00000000000000000110011) x 2^-126
[0][00000000][00000000000000000110011]
